segments.text: What are the most popular sports in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Swimming in summer and skating in winter.What ' s your favorite sport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jogging and bowling . Do you know how to practise Bungfu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No I don't But l do Taijiquan or Shadow boxing.People everywhere in China usually do Taijiquan early in the morning.It can help people keep fit.It has a history of over three hundred years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . it is I can teach you if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I can teach you how to bowl .
segments.speaker: S1
